title: Road To PBE 2021: PBE x SRAM Inclusivity Scholarship Winner Guy Stone of Relstone Bikes
content:
Leading up to the 2020 edition of the show, the Philly Bike Expo was ready to welcome the latest recipients of the PBE x SRAM Inclusivity Scholarship for Framebuilders. Unfortunately, the show was postponed on account of Covid. On the bright side, the Philly Bike Expo is back on for 2021, and itâ€™s happening this
